:• '''1150''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (40MHz chan.) + :• '''4800''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (160MHz chan.) = '''''AX6000'' class'''
{{TagLine|802.11ax Enterprise Access Points}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.aerohive.com/technology/80211ax/}} *4×4 + 4×4 802.11ax radios *Dual 1G Ethernet ports *USB, Bluetooth low energy *Powered by PoE+ power ===News=== *[https://blog.aerohive.com/aerohive-announces-three-802-11ax-access-points/ ''Aerohive announces three 802.11ax access points'' on '''Aerohive''' blog] *[https://wifinowevents.com/news-and-blog/aerohive-announces-release-802-11ax-ap-family/ ''Aerohive announces release of 802.11ax AP family'' on '''Wi-Fi Now'''] :^ Source of Broadcom chip guess ===See also=== :[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[Aerohive AP630]] *[[Aerohive AP650]] *[[Aerohive AP650X]] __NOTOC__
